Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet (udjat-eye)
Description: Here is a rather crudely manufactured udjat-eye. The reverse is flat and bears no decorative motif.  The front shows a light relief but the pattern is ill-defined.  Additionally, a break in the middle of the object makes it very difficult to identify original details.
